title: SCP-4893
content:
[[module CSS]]
.footnotes-footer {
display:none;
}

#u-aaa ~ .after,
#u-aaa ~ * .after,
#u-aaa:target ~ .before,
#u-aaa:target ~ * .before{
display: none;
}

#u-aaa ~ .before,
#u-aaa ~ * .before,
#u-aaa:target ~ .after,
#u-aaa:target ~ * .after{
display: inline;
}
[[/module]]

[[div id="u-aaa" style="display: none;"]]
[[/div]]
**項目編號：**[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「迷信」「敵意」[[/footnote]][[/span]]-4893
@@@@
**[[span class="before"]]項目等級[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Lily_yellow width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「謊言」[[/footnote]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rhododendron width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「危險」「警告」「小 心」[[/footnote]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Gladiolus width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「力量」[[/footnote]][[/span]]：**[[span class="before"]]Safe[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Begonia width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「危險」[[/footnote]][[/span]]
@@@@
**[[span class="before"]]特殊收容措施[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Lily_yellow width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Odontoglossum width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「你是特別的」[[/footnote]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/PeachBlossom width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「我是你的囚徒」[[/footnote]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Geranium_red width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「保護」[[/footnote]][[/span]]：**[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 應保存在 Site-630 內的[[span class="before"]]標準項目儲物櫃[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fern width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「信賴和庇護處」[[/footnote]][[/span]]。禁止[[span class="before"]]查看[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sanvitalia width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「看著我」[[/footnote]][[/span]] [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 的[[span class="before"]]內容[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「訊息」[[/footnote]][[/span]]。
@@@@
**[[span class="before"]]描述[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Lily_yellow width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Solidaster width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「豐富的知識」[[/footnote]][[/span]]：**[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 是一本用[[span class="before"]]荷蘭語[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Tulip_orange width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]荷蘭的國花[[/footnote]][[/span]]寫成的[[span class="before"]]詩集[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Amaryllis width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「田園詩」[[/footnote]][[/span]]，會導致讀者出現[[span class="before"]]聯覺[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rose_lavender width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「enchantment（著迷／附魔）」[[/footnote]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Lupine width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「想像」[[/footnote]][[/span]]，當受到[[span class="before"]]書面詞語[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]刺激時，會產生近義花語的花朵之幻象。
@@@@
[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 在[[span class="before"]] 1550 年[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fir width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「時間」[[/footnote]][[/span]]被[[span class="before"]]發現[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sanvitalia width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]，當時位於[[span class="before"]]荷蘭馬斯垂克[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Tulip width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Tulip_orange width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]郊外的村莊發現了一本開花的[[span class="before"]]書[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Amaryllis width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]的傳言引起了[[span class="before"]]基金會[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Mistletoe width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「我克服困難」[[/footnote]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sage width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「智慧」[[/footnote]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/CherryBlossom width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「良好的教育」[[/footnote]][[/span]]的興趣。因為[[span class="before"]]記憶消除[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Pansy width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「回憶」[[/footnote]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Poppy width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「遺忘」[[/footnote]][[/span]]已證明無效，所以 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 與其[[span class="before"]]前任[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Cyclamen width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「辭職與告別」[[/footnote]][[/span]]持有者以及其他 ██ 名受曝個體一起被[[span class="before"]]收容[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Geranium_red width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]，受曝個體被編號為 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-1。截至 [[span class="before"]]1613 年[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fir width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]] [[span class="before"]]12 月[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Narcissus width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]12 月的誕生花[[/footnote]][[/span]] 9 日，所有 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-1 的實例都[[span class="before"]]死亡[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Lily width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「死亡」[[/footnote]][[/span]]了。
@@@@
[[size larger]]**需要 3 級或更高[[span class="before"]]安保權限[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rose_white width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「保密與沉默」[[/footnote]][[/span]]。認證中...**[[/size]]
@@@@
[[size larger]]**身分認證完成。存取 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-KM2 檔案。**[[/size]]
@@@@
@@@@
[[collapsible show="+ 開啟 SCP-4893-KM2 檔案" hide="- 關閉 SCP-4893-KM2 檔案"]]
@@@@
**項目編號：**[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893
@@@@
**[[span class="before"]][[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/OrientalBittersweet width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「真實」[[/footnote]][[/span]][[span class="before"]]項目等級[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rhododendron width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Gladiolus width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]：**[[span class="before"]]Euclid[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Oleander width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「警慎」「小心」[[/footnote]][[/span]]
@@@@
**[[span class="before"]]特殊收容措施[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/OrientalBittersweet width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Odontoglossum width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/PeachBlossom width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Geranium_red width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]：**[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-A 應位於 Site-630 [[span class="before"]]標準人形收容間[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fern width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]或受到[[span class="before"]]基金會[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Mistletoe width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sage width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/CherryBlossom width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]管轄的宿舍單人房之中。不得給予任何可使 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-A 書寫[[span class="before"]]文字[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]的設備 (手寫、打字等等)。 和 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-A 的所有溝通只可藉由錄音進行。
@@@@
自 [[span class="before"]]1960 年[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fir width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]開始，[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-A 在左鎖骨的皮下組織中，應安裝配有 GPS 與生命跡象偵測功能的微晶片。
@@@@
**[[span class="before"]]描述[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/OrientalBittersweet width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Solidaster width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]：**[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 是一種人形個體，[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 所寫下的[[span class="before"]]文字[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]會導致讀者出現[[span class="before"]]聯覺[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rose_lavender width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Lupine width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]，將產生近義花語的花朵之幻象。[[span class="before"]]看見[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sanvitalia width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]] [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 所寫下之[[span class="before"]]文字[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]的人，將會獲得與 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 相同的[[span class="before"]]異常性[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rose_blue width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「神秘」[[/footnote]][[/span]] ([[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-A)。
@@　@@
 [[span class="before"]]1550 年[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fir width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]，[[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 和一本[[span class="before"]]異常[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rose_blue width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]][[span class="before"]]詩集[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Amaryllis width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]] ([[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-1) 一同被發現，當時位於[[span class="before"]]荷蘭馬斯垂克[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Tulip width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Tulip_orange width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]郊外的村莊[[span class="before"]]發現[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sanvitalia width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]了一本開花的[[span class="before"]]書[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Amaryllis width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]的傳言引起了[[span class="before"]]基金會[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Mistletoe width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sage width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/CherryBlossom width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]的興趣。[[span class="before"]]基金會[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Mistletoe width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sage width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/CherryBlossom width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]最初將 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-1 [[span class="before"]]視為[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sanvitalia width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]][[span class="before"]]異常現象[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rose_blue width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]的起因，但 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-1 的[[span class="before"]]前任[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Cyclamen width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「辭職與告別」[[/footnote]][[/span]]持有者 ([[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-A-1) 供認他創造了 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-1。結果因此發現 SCP-4893-A-1 是 [[span class="before"]]異常現象[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Rose_blue width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]的主因。
@@@@
當個體[[span class="before"]]閱讀[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sanvitalia width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]  [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 的一段實例時，他們會變成 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-A，該個體的寫作會得到 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893 的性質，[[span class="before"]]直到其死亡[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Laurel_leaf width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「至死不渝」[[/footnote]][[/span]]。在 [[span class="before"]]1758 年[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fir width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]以前，[[span class="before"]]D 級人員[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Hyssop width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「犧牲」[[/footnote]][[/span]] 暴露於 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893，以保持至少存在一名現存的 [[span class="before"]]SCP[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]-4893-A，但反覆的[[span class="before"]]收容[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/PeachBlossom width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]突破導致改用現在的[[span class="before"]]收容措施[[/span]][[span class="after"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/PeachBlossom width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Geranium_red width="24" hight="24"]][[/span]]。
[[/collapsible]]
[[span class="before"]][#u-aaa + 僅供 SCP-4893 負責研究員親眼查看][[/span]][[span class="after"]][#no-link - 至我的繼任者][[/span]]
[[div class="after"]]
@@@@
@@@@
首先，[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/CasaBlanca width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「慶祝」[[/footnote]]升遷。
@@@@
從今天起，你是[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 的[[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Burdock width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「強求」[[/footnote]]研究員，並因此是 [[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 本身。對你來說[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sanvitalia width="24" hight="24"]]此則[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]]會非常困難， 但你很快就會習慣。
@@@@
好吧，你可能在好奇。為什麼我必須要變成 [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893？為什麼不用[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Hyssop width="24" hight="24"]]？
@@@@
一開始當 [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 被[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sanvitalia width="24" hight="24"]]時是如此沒錯。事實上，[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 曾  [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Alstroemeria width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「持續」[[/footnote]] 了好多年都是 [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Goldenrod width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「健康」[[/footnote]]、年輕的[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Hyssop width="24" hight="24"]]。但今日有件事情變得不一樣了：識字率。今日在[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/JapaneseQuince width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「先鋒」[[/footnote]]以及[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Thoroughwort width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「落後」[[/footnote]]國家的許多人都能讀寫 [[image 
http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]]。不可避免地，暴露於 [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 的[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/KamchatkaLily width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「詛咒」[[/footnote]]之可能性增加了。任何由[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 寫下或打出的[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]] 都是感染源。有一些案例是過去曾[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Alstroemeria width="24" hight="24"]] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 的[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Hyssop width="24" hight="24"]]在牆上刻下[[image  http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Iris width="24" hight="24"]]導致許多[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/GiantButterbur width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「同伴」[[/footnote]] 變成 [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893。
@@@@
我們的[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Hollyhock width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「志向」[[/footnote]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Monkshood width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「騎士精神」[[/footnote]] 是「 [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fern width="24" hight="24"]]、[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/PeachBlossom width="24" hight="24"]]、[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Geranium_red width="24" hight="24"]]」。僅僅是[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Fern width="24" hight="24"]]與[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/PeachBlossom width="24" hight="24"]] 任何[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]並不夠好。因此最佳的方法是從能理解[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Mistletoe width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sage width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/CherryBlossom width="24" hight="24"]]的[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Hollyhock width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Monkshood width="24" hight="24"]]之[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Mistletoe width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Sage width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/CherryBlossom width="24" hight="24"]]人員中選擇[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 的 [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Alstroemeria width="24" hight="24"]]來執行此任務。[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Alstroemeria width="24" hight="24"]]我們[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/PeachBlossom width="24" hight="24"]]與[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Geranium_red width="24" hight="24"]]的項目。然後，有一天你會[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Alstroemeria width="24" hight="24"]][[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Shephherd'sPurse width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「我給你我的全部」[[/footnote]]這個[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Clover_white width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「誓言」[[/footnote]]給另外某個人。[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Carnation_white width="24" hight="24"]][[footnote]]「好運」[[/footnote]]
@@@@
[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Cyclamen width="24" hight="24"]] [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/StJhonswort width="24" hight="24"]]-4893 [[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4893/Burdock width="24" hight="24"]] 研究員
[[/div]]

[[footnoteblock]]
